interpretation: The Coat card represents protection, warmth, and comfort. Just as a coat shields us from the elements, this card signifies a need for emotional and physical protection. It may indicate a time of change, where you need to take care of yourself and seek support from loved ones. This card can also suggest the need to let go of old layers and embrace new beginnings. Trust that you have the strength and resilience to weather any storm. Keywords associated with this card include: security, insulation, layers, and shelter.
